item.description:
A free presentation to our 8-week introductory course of the great philosophical traditions of the East & West including:

The Buddha, Ancient India & the Gita, Plato, the Stoics, Ancient Egypt and more!

If you are interested in meeting like-minded people, exploring the classics and discussing philosophical ideas, please feel free to attend and decide after the event if the approach is of interest.

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: Philosophy 101: The Art of Happy Living
